title: Deep Floor Scrub
description: This task is designed to deep clean stained and heavily soiled areas of the facility floor using a baking soda solution and manual scrubbing. It is part of maintaining a professional

title: Opening
description: If you are the first person in the farm complete this checklist!

steps.label: Check all the lights are on in the farm

config.text:
1. Ensure the lights for the towers are on, if they are not on go to the breaker on the north east side of the farm and flip the lever back
2. Check all the lights are on in the Microgreen racks.
3. Check the NFT Upstairs
If there is water on the floor report it. Make sure to also check upstairs. Go to TEAMS -> CHAT -> GROW SPACE -> GENERAL

This only needs to be a basic analysis of the NFT, Towers, and Microgreen systems. Look for wilting, discolored leaves, drooping stems, pests, or generally weird things and report issues to: TEAMS -> CHAT -> GROW SPACE -> GENERAL

title: Clean Tower Clips
description: Clean tower clips.

description: Check the Rockwool

title: Check General Inventory Stock
description: Check the stock of Order Bags

title: Check Nutrient Inventory
description: Ensure we have enough nutrients to last roughlt three months.

title: Uncover the Leafy Green and Herb trays.
description: There should be many trays to uncover including Romaine

title: Seed Pea Microgreens
description: Use soaked seeds. Place trays directly into Watering Rack. Use 1 shim under tray in watering rack.

description: Seed the Radish Microgreens

title: Seed Mustard Microgreens
description: Do not stack while germinating.

title: Change Microgreen Reservoir Water and Clean Shelves
description: This process ensures that the water in the microgreen reservoir is fresh and properly prepared with nutrients and pH adjustments to maintain optimal plant growth. Regular water changes prevent buildup of debris

description: This process ensures that the office and lobby areas are vacuumed thoroughly to maintain cleanliness and a professional appearance. Regular vacuuming removes dirt

title: Clean Outside Facing Lobby Window
description: This process ensures the lobby’s outside-facing windows are cleaned to maintain a professional and welcoming appearance. Regular cleaning removes smudges

title: Washing Farm Towels and Filter Socks
description: This process outlines the steps for staff to take farm towels and filter socks home for washing

title: Clean Farm Floor
description: This process ensures the farm’s floors are cleaned thoroughly and sanitized using a power mop.

title: Interior Window Cleaning
description: This process outlines the steps required to open the vertical farm safely and efficiently. The checklist ensures that all systems are operational

title: Check pH and Water Levels in Towers
description: This process ensures the water pH and levels in all towers are within the optimal range for plant health. Adjustments are made as needed to maintain a target pH of 6.0 and adequate water levels using ATOs (Automatic Top Offs).

title: Seed Leafy Greens
description: Seed the leafy greens needed based off of the leafy green seedling planning spreadsheet.

title: Clean NFT Channels Covers
description: This procedure ensures that NFT channel covers are thoroughly cleaned

title: Repair Leaking NFT Channels
description: This process outlines the steps for identifying and repairing leaks in NFT channels using Flex Seal. Proper repair ensures channels remain functional and water-tight

description: This process ensures that NFT channels

title: Clean Tower Garden Pots
description: This task ensures Tower Garden pots and structural rods are thoroughly cleaned and prepped after soaking. Removing built-up grime supports plant health and extends the life of the towers.

title: Assemble Tower Gardens
